title: NNN Fall 2023: "Cutie Pies"
description: Lovingly harvested, prepared, and/or served by Jerone, Jesse, Alice, Kate, Lee, Renee, Illy, George, Yuko, & Nicola (aka “Chef Mom”). Special Thanks to Impossible Foods for the proteins, Skylight Farm Lab / Seeds to Soil for the fresh produce, Cafe 424 for the essential kitchen support, and Prime Produce for this singular community.

items.title: Fresh Fruit
items.description: Pears, plums, dragonfruit, pineapple, grapes, mandarin oranges. Please help yourself!

items.title: Charred Mushroom Oregano Soup
items.description: Char-grilled portobello and shiitake mushrooms pulverized in a creamy soy-Tofutti-butter base with navy beans, lentils, brown rice, and fresh oregano from our roof garden.  (V, AF, GF)

items.title: Apple Mint Lavender Tea
items.description: FYI: ‘Apple Mint’ is a tasty mint varietal. There aren’t any apples in this tea. Neat, huh?

items.title: Spiked Spiced Cider
items.description: Same as above, but with your preferred amount of rye bourbon? Or southern comfort?

items.title: “How The F*ck Is It October Already?” Highly Fortified White Wine Rose Spritzer
items.description: Gin, Vodka, Red Moscato, Club Soda, Rose Water. Yup

items.title: Argentine Wheat
items.description: A buttery, flaky pastry wrapper used in Argentine Empanadas. This wrapper is more durable, warming, and filling. (V, SF, AF)

items.title: Mexican Corn
items.description: Mexican empanadas are made of a simple mix of corn, water, and salt. This wrapper is more delicate, fluffy, and bright. (V, GF, SF, AF)

items.title: Savory: Cumin Curry
items.description: Impossible beef, shukuma wiki, collards, unicorn kale, ancho rojo, and ethiopian eggplant simmered in cumin, turmeric, coriander, and pepper gravy– all these greens harvested fresh from our roof garden. (V, AF, GF)

items.title: Savory: Creamy Miso Squash w/ Brown Butter Sage
items.description: Butternut squash, red miso, 3-grain tempeh, and roasted walnuts. Freshly picked shiso sage mix sauteed in browned Miyoko cashew butter. (V, AF, GF)

items.title: Savory: Buta Kimchi
items.description: Impossible pork with kimchi, fresh chives, tamari, and a hint of balsamic. (V, GF)

items.title: Sweet: Alice’s Apples
items.description: An aromatic blend of spices and fresh local apple that's perfect for dessert! (V, GF, AF, SF)

items.title: Chinese Mooncakes
items.description: Traditional “lava fruit” mooncake with salted egg custard from Dao Xiang Cun. Vegan mooncakes from Bodhi Kosher. Assorted from Fay Da Bakery.

items.title: Apple Crumb Pie, Pumpkin Pie
items.description: We cancelled the pie contest, but wanted to include a seasonal dessert pie in addition to the empanadas (which we also consider a type of “hand pie.”)
